Name: Chamber of the Sci-Mutant Priestess
About the game: Set on a distant planet, the Chamber of the Sci-Mutant Priestess combines mystic drama and humor with a sophisticated icon interface, so players can easily maneuver through the game's captivating plot. You play the role of Raven, a Tuner, whose telepathic abilities provide a unique advantage when fighting the enemy â€“ a monstrous race of mutants called Protozorqs. Command eight sci-powers with 'iconomized' ease as you probe the chambers of the mutants' temple, searching for your abducted girlfriend while engaging in a brain-draining test of five ordeals. Animated and colorful, the Chamber of the Sci-Mutant Priestess promises hours of challenging intrigue for novice and expert fantasy game players alike. Don't miss out on the first psionic thriller of its kind!
